   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(openssl_session_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: %% Callback functions
   26: -export([all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% Testcases
   36: -export([reuse_session_erlang_server/0,
   37:          reuse_session_erlang_server/1,
   38:          reuse_session_erlang_client/0,
   39:          reuse_session_erlang_client/1
   40:          ]).
   41: 
   42: -define(SLEEP, 1000).
   43: -define(EXPIRE, 10).
   44: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 120}).
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: all() -> 
   51:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   52:         true ->
   53:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   54:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   55:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
   56:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   57:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
   58:         false ->
   59:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   60:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   61:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
   62:              ]
   63:     end.
   64: 
   65: groups() ->
   66:      case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   67:          true ->
   68:              [{'tlsv1.2', [], tests()},
   69:               {'tlsv1.1', [], tests()},
   70:               {'tlsv1', [], tests()},
   71:               {'dtlsv1.2', [], tests()},
   72:               {'dtlsv1', [], tests()}
   73:              ];
   74:         false ->
   75:              [{'tlsv1.2', [], tests()},
   76:               {'tlsv1.1', [], tests()},
   77:               {'tlsv1', [], tests()}
   78:            ]
   79:      end.
   80:  
   81: tests() ->
   82:     [    
   83:          reuse_session_erlang_server,
   84:          reuse_session_erlang_client
   85:     ].
   86: 
   87: 
   88: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   89:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   90:     {ClientOpts, ServerOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert_chains(
   91:                                  [{server_chain, ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf()},
   92:                                   {client_chain, ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf()}],
   93:                                  Config, "openssl_session_SUITE"),
   94:     [{client_opts, ClientOpts}, {server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config].
   95: 
   96: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   97:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   98: 
   99: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  100:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  101: 
  102: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  103:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  104: 
  105: init_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_client, Config) ->
  106:     ct:timetrap(?EXPIRE * 1000 * 5),
  107:     ssl:stop(),
  108:     application:load(ssl),
  109:     application:set_env(ssl, session_lifetime, ?EXPIRE),
  110:     ssl:start(),
  111:     Config;
  112: init_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_server, Config) ->
  113:     case ssl_test_lib:working_openssl_client(Config) of
  114:         true ->
  115:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  116:             case ssl_test_lib:is_dtls_version(Version) of
  117:                 true ->
  118:                     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls_session_reuse() of
  119:                         true ->
  120:                             ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  121:                             Config;
  122:                         false ->
  123:                             {skip, "Broken OpenSSL DTLS session reuse"}
  124:                     end;
  125:                 false ->
  126:                     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  127:                     Config
  128:             end;
  129:         false  ->
  130:             {skip, "Broken OpenSSL s_client"}
  131:     end;
  132: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  133:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  134:     Config.
  135: 
  136: end_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_client, Config) ->
  137:     application:unset_env(ssl, session_lifetime),
  138:     Config;
  139: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: reuse_session_erlang_server() ->
  148:     [{doc, "Test erlang server with openssl client that reconnects with the"
  149:       "same session id, to test reusing of sessions."}].
  150: reuse_session_erlang_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  151:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config),
  152:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_opts, Config),
  153:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  154:     
  155:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  156:     
  157: 
  158:     Data = "From openssl to erlang",
  159:     
  160:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  161:                                         {from, self()},
  162:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, active_recv, [length(Data)]}},
  163:                                         {reconnect_times, 5},
  164:                                         {options, [{versions, [Version]}| ServerOpts]}]),
  165:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  166: 
  167:     
  168:     {_Client, OpenSSLPort} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port}, 
  169:                                                                  {reconnect, true},
  170:                                                                  {options, ClientOpts}, 
  171:                                                                  return_port], Config),
  172:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, Data),
  173:     
  174:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Data),
  175:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  176: 
  177: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: 
  179: reuse_session_erlang_client() ->
  180:     [{doc, "Test erlang ssl client that wants to reuse sessions"}].
  181: reuse_session_erlang_client(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  182:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  183:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
  184:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  185: 
  186:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  187:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [], 
  188:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  189:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),    
  190:     
  191:     Client0 =
  192:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  193:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  194:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  195:                                    {from, self()}, 
  196:                                    {options, [{reuse_sessions, save}, 
  197:                                               {verify, verify_peer},
  198:                                               {versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  199:     
  200:     SID = receive
  201:               {Client0, Id0} ->
  202:                   Id0
  203:           end,
  204:     
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  206:     
  207:     Client1 =
  208:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  209:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  210:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  211:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{versions, [Version]},
  212:                                                                {reuse_session, SID} | ClientOpts]}]),
  213:     receive
  214:         {Client1, SID} ->
  215:             ok
  216:     after ?SLEEP ->
  217:             ct:fail(session_not_reused)
  218:     end,
  219:     
  220:     
  221:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  222:     %% Make sure session is unregistered due to expiration
  223:     ct:sleep(20000),
  224:     
  225:     Client2 =
  226:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  227:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  228:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  229:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  230:     receive
  231:         {Client2, ID} ->
  232:             case ID of
  233:                 SID ->    
  234:                     ct:fail(expired_session_reused);
  235:                 _  ->
  236:                     ok
  237:             end
  238:     end,
  239:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2).
  240:
